text: When I add an artifact in Julia v1.5.2, it produces a SHA-1 hash that's different from the OSX and Linux hashes (which are the same). I assume it has something to do with <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/pull/2253>, but it's unclear how to work around that for pre-v1.6 packages.

elements.text: When I add an artifact in Julia v1.5.2, it produces a SHA-1 hash that's different from the OSX and Linux hashes (which are the same). I assume it has something to do with
, but it's unclear how to work around that for pre-v1.6 packages.

text: Update: by manually patching the Artifacts.toml SHA-1 entry to the Linux/OSX artifact, it now works for all platforms

elements.text: Update: by manually patching the Artifacts.toml SHA-1 entry to the Linux/OSX artifact, it now works for all platforms
